Texts.Chs: 我个人则认为原因是一种毁灭性的寄生虫式传染病。通过研究一些在最近被遗弃的鬼城中设法幸存下来的艾肯核心，我发现了大量的小洞，当扫描时，显示出一幅令人毛骨悚然的隧道地图。小小的物体躺在里面，也许是卵，但当试图取样时就蒸发了。
Texts.Eng: I, personally, believe it was a devastating contagious disease in the form of a parasite. By studying some X'i cores that managed to survive the event in recently abandoned ghost towns, I found plenty of small holes that, when scanned, showed a map of unnerving tunnels. Small objects laid within, perhaps eggs, but evaporated when samples were attempted.

Texts.Chs: 是什么导致了艾肯的大规模死亡和濒临灭绝，对我们来说是一个有争议的谜团。猜测包括了从入侵到流星撞击或伽马射线爆发等事件。不管发生了什么，近98%的艾肯突然同时中断，而它们的核心也随之死亡。
Texts.Eng: What caused the mass die-off and near extinction of the X'i is a debated mystery to us. Speculations range from invasion to events such as meteor strikes or gamma ray bursts. Whatever happened, nearly 98% were almost simultaneously rendered intert, their cores dying along with them.

Texts.Chs:
是什么导致了艾肯的大规模死亡和濒临灭绝，对我们来说是一个有争议的谜团。猜测包括了从入侵到流星撞击或伽马射线爆发等事件。不管发生了什么，近98%的艾肯突然同时中断，而它们的核心也随之死亡。
我个人则认为原因是一种毁灭性的寄生虫式传染病。通过研究一些在最近被遗弃的鬼城中设法幸存下来的艾肯核心，我发现了大量的小洞，当扫描时，显示出一幅令人毛骨悚然的隧道地图。小小的物体躺在里面，也许是卵，但当试图取样时就蒸发了。
根据我的假设，我唯一缺少的是这种疾病的触媒。在未来，我们只要调查更多的死亡城市，我们就有可能幸运地发现更多隐藏的真相。而我们只需要一个样本就够了！
Texts.Eng:
What caused the mass die-off and near extinction of the X'i is a debated mystery to us. Speculations range from invasion to events such as meteor strikes or gamma ray bursts. Whatever happened, nearly 98% were almost simultaneously rendered intert, their cores dying along with them.
Personally, I believe it was a devastating contagious disease in the form of a parasite. By studying some X'i cores that managed to survive the event in recently abandoned ghost towns, I found plenty of small holes that, when scanned, showed a map of unnerving tunnels. Small objects laid within, perhaps eggs, but evaporated when samples were attempted.
With my hypothesis, many questions are easily answered. We may be fortunate in uncovering more hidden truths in the coming days as we investigate more dead cities. A single sample is all we need!

Texts.Chs: 根据我的假设，我唯一缺少的是这种疾病的触媒。在未来，我们只要调查更多的死亡城市，我们就有可能幸运地发现更多隐藏的真相。而我们只需要一个样本就够了！
Texts.Eng: With my hypothesis, the only thing I'm missing is the catalyst for this disease. We may be fortunate in uncovering more hidden truths in the coming days as we investigate more dead cities. A single sample is all we need!
